comments.body: Quote from: scrappydoo62 on January 27, 2023, 06:51:54 AMScammer, avoidDid you get scammed by OP?If you did, please share the details. This could help avoid him for scamming more victims who end up reading this thread through a small research. You can use this board to post your scam accusation - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0Follow this scam reporting format - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0
